name: SummaryLayout

fields.name: masterLabel
fields.description: The name of the layout label.

fields.name: sizeX
fields.description: Number of columns in the highlights pane, between 1 and 4 (inclusive).

fields.name: sizeY
fields.description: Number of rows in each column, either 1 or 2.

fields.name: sizeZ
fields.description: If provided, the setting is not visible to users.

fields.name: summaryLayoutItems
fields.description: Controls the appearance of an individual field and its column and row position within the highlights panel grid, when Case Feed is enabled. At least one is required.

methods.name: clone
methods.description: Makes a duplicate copy of the Metadata.SummaryLayout.

description: Controls the appearance of the highlights panel, which summarizes key fields in a grid at the top of a page layout, when Case Feed is enabled.
